ciphers.name: Cipher #1
ciphers.ciphertext: MGIQMROXGXRFNMMRSWRWYEINZSGXXWNZWQHWEPPQXIWBBKZYWHKXMWFYGK
ciphers.plaintext: misinterestedintheseworthlessbeingsallhisworkwillbeundonex
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: M is interested in these worthless beings. All his work will be undone. X
notes: To reveal this cipher, you must hold square on a brick near the beast pedestal.

ciphers.name: Cipher #2
ciphers.plaintext: iamwillingtodowhatmustbedonetheplanmustnotfail
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: I am willing to do what must be done. The plan must not fail.
notes: To view this cipher, it is located on the underside of the ritual table.

ciphers.name: Cipher #3
ciphers.ciphertext: MNWQUTTDIBRNZYEFJZDFYAJGNUSEFVYTOENLSQOXTBAHUUPRJPNOFFJPOLVPWXBTNIRODFFEENO

ciphers.formatted_plaintext: The elders will continue to seed space and time. I must lead them to the place they cannot see.

ciphers.name: Cipher #4
ciphers.ciphertext: HHGGGAVVGGFMIEAPQVNBBYVTNJICRUUGPYRELEOPK.ZHDC
ciphers.plaintext: althoughtheyhavediscoveredthewayprimiswillfail
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Although they have discovered the way, Primis will fail.

anomalies.description: Seems to be only one website that translated this correctly: https://www.braingle.com/brainteasers/codes/trifid.php#form

notes: To make this cipher visible, you have to shoot the picture frame down off the wall.

ciphers.name: Cipher #5
ciphers.plaintext: THE FORMLESS ONE, WILL BE THEIR DOWNFALL
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: The formless one will be their downfall.
notes: Wondering what the , or . is in the middle. Is it meant to be read backwards?

ciphers.name: Cipher Flags
ciphers.ciphertext: * Refer to Image *
ciphers.plaintext: AFTER --- FACILITY DIVISION 9 IS MOVING WITH PHASE 2 THE ISLAND FACILITY IS NOW OPERATIONAL AND INITIAL TESTING UNDERWAY
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: After the success at the Rising Sun facility, Division 9 is moving with phase 2. The island facility is now operational and initial testing underway.

anomalies.description: The material image seems to be missing a portion of the semaphore ciphertext.

notes: Denoted as cypher2 flags, along the base64 note one.

ciphers.formatted_plaintext: We have discovered that there are beings that can travel between dimensions without the aid of the teleporter.
notes: Denoted as cypher2 note, along the flag semaphore one.

ciphers.name: Cipher Note #2
ciphers.ciphertext: FZIL COVNITF KUN ER GYYWKJOLC FEEKUBY XIRXAANW PA VUVYSOV QY DEY FO AZ IT IUIB SYNWM DOQ MIMR JOAB EQ

ciphers.formatted_plaintext: After sending him on countless suicide missions, he refuses to die. He is in your hands now. Don't fail us.'

ciphers.name: Cipher Mathematics
ciphers.plaintext: Division 9 has completed the ressurection of the ancient beasts for your eastern front. We expect Group 935 to reciprocate the favor.
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Division 9 has completed the ressurection of the ancient beasts for your eastern front. We expect Group 935 to reciprocate the favor.

anomalies.description: The website that was originally used is no longer available, and I am unable to find it (like I previously did) on Internet Archive.

ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Father introduced me to a new friend that just arrived. His name is Edward. He is nice, but he doesn't like to share the toys.

ciphers.plaintext: THE LAST X TEST SUBJECT X THE MEXICAN DIED BUT DURING THE AUTOPSY I HAVE DISCOVERED THE KEY TO CREATE THE ARMY THAT VXVE SEXEK VXVE ARE NOVXV READY TO CAPTURE THE FOUR SUBJECTS IDENTIFIED IN REPORT FORTY FOUR
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: The last test subject, the Mexican, died, but during the autopsy, I have discovered the keey to create the army that we seek. We are now ready to capture the four subjects identified in report forty four.

ciphers.plaintext: afterthegreatbattletheystooduponthemoundtheirlightshonedownandcleansedallthesicknessforasfarastheeyecouldseetheyarethefirst;theyarethelast…visionsoffracturedworldsandstrangeroomshauntedourdreams
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: After the great battle they stood upon the mound their light shone down and cleansed all the sickness for as far as the eye could see. They are the first; they are the last… visions of fractured worlds and strange rooms haunted our dreams. The crate containing the artifact had been sealed with some ancient magic. When I told him I must have the artifact and moved toward the crate, he attacked me. I acted in self-defense stabbing him in the chest.

ciphers.formatted_plaintext: I have received another toy. Posted by M.

ciphers.name: Cipher #5
ciphers.plaintext: MISSIONLOGENTRYFORTYFIVEIAMOVERTHESITELOOKINGDOWNTHROUGHTHEOPENDOORICANSEEAWEIRDDISTORTIONBELOWMELIKEALOCALIZEDAURORABOREALISIWOULDNORMALLYCANCELTHEOPERATIONBUTWEDONTHAVETIMELUCKILYIHAVETAKENEXPERIMENTALWEAPONRYVERSIONTHREETHATNOONEHASSEENBEFOREFROMMYPREVIOUSMISSIONNEVERSAYNEVERPETER
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Mission Log Entry Forty Five: I am over the site looking down through the open door. I can see a weird distortion below me like a localized aurora borealis. I would normally cancel the operation, but we don't have time. Luckily, I have taken experimental weaponry version three that no one has seen before from my previous mission. Never say never, Peter.

HEAEA IOBRB UDWAD ,WIIN YTAFA LCENT ACAEA CFEIE POTIE INKWH HBATV IIMEH NITDW NTOVA NTTAD SENRS TRDHR UCT,T SACAN HG.TI ACEIE IHATR DTTEN MIDOE FWAGI NEERB INNSH TECNH AITML ETDHE CINST HETHR TENGI TEITE ,DLTE LACOR NSE.W MTITE ,.-DN STERW E.HIN HARRR NGLET TAYEE AEOMC MIRED TMEFB IE
ciphers.plaintext: IMEETTHEREPORTERWHOWASTODELIVERTHEARTIFACT.HESAIDHEWASGOINGTOBRINGITONHISTRUCKINACRATE.BUTWHENIARRIVED,THEREPORTERWASBABBLING,ANDACTINGWILDLY,WAVINGALETTERINHISHANDTELLINGMETOSTAYAWAY.THECRATECONTAININGTHEARTIFACTHADBEENSEALEDWITHSOMEANCIENTMAGIC.WHENITOLDHIMIMUSTHAVETHEARTIFACTANDMOVEDTOWARDTHECRATE,HEATTACKEDME.IACTEDINSELF-DEFENSESTABBINGHIMINTHECHEST.
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: I meet the reporter who was to deliver the artifact. He said he was going to bring it on his truck in a crate. But when I arrived, the reporter was babbling, and acting wildly, waving a letter in his hand telling me to stay away. The crate containing the artifact had been sealed with some ancient magic. When I told him I must have the artifact and moved toward the crate, he attacked me. I acted in self-defense stabbing him in the chest.

ciphers.name: Cipher #1
ciphers.plaintext: of the four test subjects highlighted in report 44 one of the brothers has died before we could reach him in the battle the other is still at large in the city
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Of the four test subjects highlighted in Report 44, one of the brothers has died before we could reach him in the battle. The other is still at large in the city.
notes: +81 refers to the Japanese area code.

ciphers.name: Cipher #2
ciphers.ciphertext: 
ciphers.plaintext: Entry 56: Just finished a very long vhift. We were awaiting the test subjects arrival from the castle but they never showed. Those group 935 pigs didnt even bother to radio the asylum to let us know they were not coming. I am getting sick of those arrogant scientists. They have given the asylum the nickname Verruckt Asylum. I loathe it. We are as every bit as important to the completion of project as they are.
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Entry 56: Just finished a very long vhift. We were awaiting the test subjects arrival from the castle but they never showed. Those group 935 pigs didnt even bother to radio the asylum to let us know they were not coming. I am getting sick of those arrogant scientists. They have given the asylum the nickname Verruckt Asylum. I loathe it. We are as every bit as important to the completion of project as they are.

ciphers.plaintext: I shut down the power for the night. We must conserve the gasoline, so I am told, because the Emperor is in doubt of the usefulness of our research here at the Rising Sun facility, and that resupplying the facility will now occur every other month rather than our usually scheduled weekly drops. Hopefully, the new meteor site produces higher grade samples, ones we can actually use. Wait is that a plane I hear. The resupply is not scheduled for another week. I see a bright light in the sky....
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: I shut down the power for the night. We must conserve the gasoline, so I am told, because the Emperor is in doubt of the usefulness of our research here at the Rising Sun facility, and that resupplying the facility will now occur every other month rather than our usually scheduled weekly drops. Hopefully, the new meteor site produces higher grade samples, ones we can actually use. Wait is that a plane I hear. The resupply is not scheduled for another week. I see a bright light in the sky....

ciphers.plaintext: Richtofen must understand that using these teleporters to jump between dimensions is both dangerous and imprecise. At any point, the fabric of space-time could collapse if the proper amounts of 115 are not maintained. I am also concerned about the unknown effects of trans-dimensional jumps. I have noticed even with my brief travels that new memories and emotions have flooded my mind, suddenly appearing from nowhere.  I am also sure something is happening on a molecular level as well.
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Richtofen must understand that using these teleporters to jump between dimensions is both dangerous and imprecise. At any point, the fabric of space-time could collapse if the proper amounts of 115 are not maintained. I am also concerned about the unknown effects of trans-dimensional jumps. I have noticed even with my brief travels that new memories and emotions have flooded my mind, suddenly appearing from nowhere. I am also sure something is happening on a molecular level as well.

ciphers.plaintext: Entry 58: We have been having power fluctuations for the past couple of days. Consequently, we have had to rely more and more on the backup generators. It's strange, ever since we have been having issues with the power, people are reporting hearing voices coming from the walls. They say they can hear quiet sobbing from a boy and a girl, as well as, a man shouting for children to close the windows. I have not heard the voices, but I have to admit something feels different about this place
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Entry 58: We have been having power fluctuations for the past couple of days. Consequently, we have had to rely more and more on the backup generators. It's strange, ever since we have been having issues with the power, people are reporting hearing voices coming from the walls. They say they can hear quiet sobbing from a boy and a girl, as well as, a man shouting for children to close the windows. I have not heard the voices, but I have to admit something feels different about this place.

anomalies.description: Line 3 has the wrong input, and should start with SXQncy... instead of SXZcy...

ciphers.plaintext: My name is my name. My name? OH. Yes, it is gersh. How long have I been floating? Minutes? Years? Where is now? I guess I can forgive Yuri. I quite like my new form. Hmmm, where am I now. A city on fire by a river. I know this place. Finally, I am home.
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: My name is my name. My name? OH. Yes, it is gersh. How long have I been floating? Minutes? Years? Where is now? I guess I can forgive Yuri. I quite like my new form. Hmmm, where am I now. A city on fire by a river. I know this place. Finally, I am home.

anomalies.description: Line 3 has the wrong input, and should start with SXQncy... instead of SXZcy...

notes: Uses entry 6 on the list of cipher keys as the key for this cipher.

ciphers.name: Cipher #8
ciphers.plaintext: EDWARD AS YOU KNOW IT IS IMPERATIVE YOU AND THE GROUP FIND THE EXACT VERSIONS OF YOURSELVES THAT I HAVE HIGHLIGHTED IN THAT PARTICULAR MOMENT IN TIME WILL WE BE SUCCESSFUL ONCE EACH OF YOUR OTHER SELFS ARE KILLED AND ABSORBED THEY WILL CEASE TO EXIST ACROSS ALL UNIVERSES REMEMBER WE ARE ONLY IMMUNE BECAUSE WE OPENED THE PORTAL IN FRANCE BUT I AM AFRAID THIS MIGHT NOT BE PERMANENT I FEAR THERE IS SOMETHING M ISNT TELLING ME AND THAT THERE IS NOT MUCH TIME LEFT FOR US
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Edward, as you know it is imperative you and the group find the exact versions of yourselves that I have highlighted in that particular moment in time. Will we be successful once each of your other selfs are killed and absorbed? They will cease to exist across all universes. Remember, we are only immune because we opened the portal in France, but I am afraid this might not be permanent. I fear there is something M isn't telling me and that there is not much time left for us.

anomalies.description: It seems that 23091212 and 2305 should be swapped since this poses a question, but it could be both interpretations.

ciphers.plaintext: Comrade, I hope these schematics reach you in time so our scientists can make use of them, for I know the western front is on the brink of collapse. These schematics I have stolen from Group 935 will enable us to construct our own wonder weapons which will help us turn the tide of the war and give us victory over the German pigs. I fear, however, I will not live to see this. --V
ciphers.formatted_plaintext: Comrade, I hope these schematics reach you in time so our scientists can make use of them, for I know the western front is on the brink of collapse. These schematics I have stolen from Group 935 will enable us to construct our own wonder weapons which will help us turn the tide of the war and give us victory over the German pigs. I fear, however, I will not live to see this. --V
notes: Uses entry 3 on the list of cipher keys as the key for this cipher.
